full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTZA GSUM KUN 'DUS BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(ZHAL SHES PHRAN DU YOD RNAMS SHES PAR BYA, ,TSUL 'DIR RANG GI NANG GI SLOB MA MCHOG ,DAD LDAN GNYER BA BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG GIS, ,DE NI KHO NA DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,BSHES GNYEN DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG SGROS LTAR, ,PADMA RGYAL PO RTZAL ZHES BYA BAS SBYAR, ,DGE BAS MA GYUR 'GRO BA MA LUS PA, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG GIS RJES SU 'DZIN GYUR CIG ,YI GE 'DU BYED PA NI RNAM DPYOD LDAN, ,BLO BZANG TSE RING GIS BSKRUN DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
